thread.title: Sloth Kong Airport Photo Contest winner for June is...
thread.title_full: Sloth Kong Airport Photo Contest winner for June is... -The Tico Times

author: The Tico Times
title: Sloth Kong Airport Photo Contest winner for June is...
text:
Krysta Benzenberg!!! with a display of handstand mastery. On behalf of Krysta and SK, we’ll donate $100 to Hogar Sol for needy children in Costa Rica.
The contest rules are simple: Take your photo with Sloth Kong at Juan Santamaría International Airport before boarding your flight back home, share it with us on Facebook , Instagram or Twitter or email it to sk@ticotimes.net . Be sure to include the hashtag ‪#‎ SlothKong‬ . Check out our tagboard here: www.ticotimes.net/skcontest/ .
Every month, we’ll choose the most creative photo and donate $100 on behalf of the winner to the institution Hogar Sol.
Congratulations Krysta!
